events.description: An array of retrospective events that happened in your day.

countables.description: An array of retrospective countables that happened in your day.

countable.description: Something that happened in your day that can be counted. Steps, water consumed, etc.

key.description: a slugable key for the countable item using underscores instead of spaces. ounces_water, cookies_eaten, etc.

count.description: The count for the event. This is the number of times the event happened.

event.description: Something that happened in your day. Maybe you read a book, told a funny joke, or went on a fun outing. This is a record of that event.

key.description: a slugable key for the event item using underscores instead of spaces. Like movies_watched, books_read, or restaurants_tried.

description.description: What was the event? Watched a movie, what movie? Went to the beach?
